Name: NOXIAM -miserable sinners-
About the game: NOXIAM -miserable sinners- Run away. From this spooky mansion. You are in a huge mysterious mansion. Let's run away from here. Strange sounds, shadows and strange puzzles are waiting for you. Come to this creepy world. This work also supports VR. This work can be played without a VR device. VR support is currently only Oculus Lift + Oculus Touch.
